title.rendered: Financial Commission Certifies BigBrainBank as an Educational Provider

content.rendered:
May 19th, 2020, the Financial Commission today announces BigBrainBank as a certified educational provider.

The Financial Commission conducted a thorough review of the educational content BigBrainBank offers helping to ensure that users who receive such content have access to accurate educational materials.

BigBrainBank demonstrated compliance with a set of standards that the Financial Commission requires to meet as part of the certification process. BigBrainBank is now listed on the Financial Commission’s official website as a certified education provider.

About BigBrainBank

BigBrainBank is an expert in education and the empowerment of people who seek to harness professional knowledge of the world of finance and investments. The company collaborates with strategic partners from around the world to create synergy for its customers. These are the key drivers that enable BigBrainBank to provide superior quality products and services that are foundational training to create wealth and financial freedom. This is the real investment that everyone should put in – investing in self – that is the basis for success in life.

BigBrainBank matches these with great customer service. BigBrainBank believe in a personal touch and integrate specialized solutions with on-ground training support and online resources for the best results.

About Financial Commission

Financial Commission is an independent external dispute resolution (EDR) organization for consumers/traders who are unable to resolve disputes directly with their financial services providers that are members of the Financial Commission. Financial Commission initially set out to provide a new approach for traders and brokers alike to resolve any issues that arise in the course of trading electronic markets such as Foreign Exchange, and then expanded into CFDs and related derivatives, in addition to certifying technology platforms used for trading.

For more information please contact us at info@financialcommission.com.co.
